description: A report says "unprofitable" Isle of Man churches should be sold or closed to save funds.
title: Coronavirus leaves Diocese of Sodor and Man 'on brink of financial ruin'
title_page: Coronavirus leaves Diocese of Sodor and Man 'on brink of financial ruin' - BBC News
maintext: It also said only parishes with a population above 6,000 should have stipendiary clergy, which could mean smaller parishes having to merge with a neighbour, but the diocese should not reduce numbers "below current levels or we may cease to be functional".
